fees.description:
Access wholesale energy rates with a $13.99/month membership fee.
For more information on these fees and other fees, please visit energylocalsretail.com.au/fees
Charged when a direct debit payment has dishonoured or reversed. This charge is not subject to GST.
Charged for providing a paper bill
May be charged when you move into a property or change retailer. Actual fee may vary.
May be charged when you move out and require a final meter read. Actual fee may vary.

We accept Visa, Mastercard & AMEX payments via energylocalsretail.com.au/pay-by-card. Debit card transactions are subject to a 0.46% fee, and credit card payments incur a 0.81% fee. Card processing fees are waived for Direct Debit payments.

electricityContract.terms: Energy Locals offers no lock in contracts or exit fees.
electricityContract.variation: Due to changes in the market and economic conditions, we may update your tariff and/or fees. We will provide at least 5 business days' notice before the change takes place.

incentives.eligibility: Enjoy a free membership to Entertainment (valued at up to $69.99), which provides you with access to a range of offers and discounts. T&Cs apply: energylocalsretail.com.au/terms-and-conditions-local-rewards/

Receive a $50 account credit if you mention an existing Energy Locals customer when you join. The friend also gets $50 credit. T&Cs apply: energylocalsretail.com.au/terms-and-conditions-refer-a-friend. Energy Locals can withdraw this offer at any time.

eligibility.information: Available to all the customers in the tariff code.
